deity_markdown: [Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Belial](/Deities.aspx?ID=396), [Bes](/Deities.aspx?ID=633), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=470), [Grask Uldeth](/Deities.aspx?ID=555), [Lady Jingxi](/Deities.aspx?ID=310), [Laivatiniel](/Deities.aspx?ID=419), [Likha](/Deities.aspx?ID=616), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=565), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=352), [Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos)](/Deities.aspx?ID=573), [Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx)](/Deities.aspx?ID=574), [Ozranvial](/Deities.aspx?ID=599), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), [Thisamet](/Deities.aspx?ID=655), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681)
markdown:
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 329 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Bloodlines** [Diabolic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=22), [Fey](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=25) **Deities** [Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Belial](/Deities.aspx?ID=396), [Bes](/Deities.aspx?ID=633), [Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=279), [Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=470), [Grask Uldeth](/Deities.aspx?ID=555), [Lady Jingxi](/Deities.aspx?ID=310), [Laivatiniel](/Deities.aspx?ID=419), [Likha](/Deities.aspx?ID=616), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=565), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=352), [Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos)](/Deities.aspx?ID=573), [Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx)](/Deities.aspx?ID=574), [Ozranvial](/Deities.aspx?ID=599), [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=293), [Thisamet](/Deities.aspx?ID=655), [Tlehar](/Deities.aspx?ID=681) **Range** 120 feet **Target** all creatures in range **Defense** Will **Duration** sustained --- Your words fascinate your targets. You speak or sing without interruption throughout the casting and duration. Targets who notice your speech or song might give their undivided attention; each target must attempt a Will save. The GM might grant a circumstance bonus (to a maximum of +4) if the target is of an opposing religion, ancestry, or political leaning, or is otherwise unlikely to agree with what you're saying. Each creature that comes within range has to attempt a save when you Sustain the spell. If you're speaking, _enthrall_ gains the [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) trait. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected and notices that you tried to use magic.
**Success** The target needn't pay attention but doesn't notice you tried to use magic (it might notice others are enthralled).
**Failure** The target is [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) with you. It can attempt another Will save if it witnesses actions or speech with which it disagrees. If it succeeds, it's no longer fascinated and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. If the target is subject to a [hostile act](/Rules.aspx?ID=300), or if another creature succeeds at a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check against it, the fascination ends immediately.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the target can't attempt a save to end the fascination if it disagrees with you.
name: Enthrall

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

 

**Target** all creatures in range
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** sustained
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.
</summary>
summary: Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.
summary_markdown: Your speech makes creatures fascinated with you.
text: Enthrall Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 329 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodlines Diabolic, Fey Deities Ardad Lili, Belial, Bes, Calistria, Eritrice, Grask Uldeth, Lady Jingxi, Laivatiniel, Likha, Lissala, Milani, Nyarlathotep (The Crawling Chaos), Nyarlathotep (The Faceless Sphinx), Ozranvial, Shelyn, Thisamet, Tlehar Range 120 feet Target all creatures in range Defense Will Duration sustained --- Your words fascinate your targets. You speak or sing without interruption throughout the casting and duration. Targets who notice your speech or song might give their undivided attention; each target must attempt a Will save. The GM might grant a circumstance bonus (to a maximum of +4) if the target is of an opposing religion, ancestry, or political leaning, or is otherwise unlikely to agree with what you're saying. Each creature that comes within range has to attempt a save when you Sustain the spell. If you're speaking, enthrall gains the linguistic trait. Critical Success The target is unaffected and notices that you tried to use magic. Success The target needn't pay attention but doesn't notice you tried to use magic (it might notice others are enthralled). Failure The target is fascinated with you. It can attempt another Will save if it witnesses actions or speech with which it disagrees. If it succeeds, it's no longer fascinated and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. If the target is subject to a hostile act, or if another creature succeeds at a Diplomacy or Intimidation check against it, the fascination ends immediately. Critical Failure As failure, but the target can't attempt a save to end the fascination if it disagrees with you.
